thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hexagon's Rollen says relieved by verdict, remains committed as CEO​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hexagon's Rollen says relieved by verdict, remains committed as CEO​
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Hexagon:
* SAYS ‍“I AM RELIEVED BY COURT‘S VERDICT, CONFIRMING WHAT I AND MY LAWYERS HAVE STATED FROM BEGINNING; THAT I DID NOTHING WRONG” SAID OLA ROLLÉN​
* ROLLEN SAYS ‍I REMAIN COMMITTED TO SERVING AS CEO FOR HEXAGON FOR AS LONG AS BOARD AND SHAREHOLDERS WILL ALLOW​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Stockholm Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
